    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Azija (Srednja) - nema karta</string>
            <string language="en">Central Asis - outline map</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zentrales Asis - umreißkarte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Asis central - carte d'ensemble</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Asis central - mapa do esboço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Asis centrale - programma del profilo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεντρικό Asis - χάρτης περιγραμμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asis central - correspondencia del contorno</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prazna karta osrednje Azije z državnimi mejami - primerno za poimenovanje držav, vrisovanje rek, mest, ...</string>
            <string language="en">Outline map of central Asia with given borders between countries - suitable to locate country, draw rivers, towns, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">osrednja azija</string>
            <string language="en">central asia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">geografija</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nema karta</string>
            <string language="en">outline map</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zemljevid</string>
            <string language="en">map</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umreißen Sie Karte von zentralem Asien mit 
gegebenen Rändern zwischen den Ländern -, die verwendbar sind, Land,
Betragflüsse, Städte zu lokalisieren...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tracez les grandes lignes de la carte de l'Asie 
centrale avec les cadres donnés entre les pays - appropriés pour 
localiser le pays, fleuves d'aspiration, villes...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboce o mapa de Ásia central com beiras dadas 
entre os países - apropriados encontrar o país, rios da tração, 
cidades...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descriva il programma dell'Asia centrale con i 
dati bordi fra i paesi - adatti individuare il paese, i fiumi di 
tiraggio, città...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης περιγραμμάτων της κεντρικής Ασίας με τα 
δεδομένα σύνορα μεταξύ των χωρών - κατάλληλων να εντοπίσουν τη 
χώρα, να σύρει τους ποταμούς, πόλεις...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contornee la correspondencia de Asia central con 
las fronteras dadas entre los países - convenientes localizar el 
país, ríos del drenaje, ciudades...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zentrales Asien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umreißkarte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Asie centrale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte d'ensemble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
